DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct investigate effect rice based-meal functional constipation young Korean woman .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Brown Rice Based-meal Polished Rice Based-meal Wheat Based-meal Functional Constipation Young Korean Women
DOC.criteria: Age 19 30 year females Meet Rome Ⅲ diagnostic criterion functional constipation Ability give inform consent Subject history evidence clinically significant gastrointestinal , anorectal , hepatic , renal , neurological , pulmonary , endocrine , blood tumor , psychiatric , cardiovascular disease Subjects gastrointestinal ( GI ) disease ( Crohn 's disease , etc . ) would increase influence absorbance medication GI surgery exclude appendectomy hernia surgery Known history moderate severe hepatic impairment ( i.e. , serum ALT > 1.5×ULN , AST > 1.5×ULN ) Subjects significant hypersensitivity brown rice , polished rice , wheat , milk Regular ingestion probiotic product Subjects receive certain medication cause alteration bowel movement within past 2weeks prior first administration Subjects participate clinical investigation within 2 month prior first administration Subject drink constantly ( 21 units/week ) Subject pregnant breast feeding Subject irritable bowel syndrome ROME Ⅲ criterion Any significant condition , opinion investigator , could interfere subject 's participation compliance study ( i.e. , laboratory test others )
